content: After the market closed today, Qumu issued a press release announcing its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2022, a copy of which is available in the Investor Relations section of the company's website. Overall, Qumu's improving financial results and strong SaaS KPIs reflect the increasing success momentum of our partner-led sales strategy and our current customers growing their investment with Qumu as their trusted provider of live and asynchronous video content. As Rose highlighted, SaaS revenue for Q3 2022 increased 6% to $2.8 million compared to $2.6 million in Q3 2021. Proactive cost rationalization has been a consistent highlight during the first 9 months of 2022, enabling us to improve quarterly cash used in operations each quarter from $4.9 million in Q1, $3.7 million in Q2 and $1.4 million in Q3.
